channel.title: CVE Feed for themegrill -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for themegrill -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-0679|2024-08-01T18:11:35.691Z -- themegrill -- colormag
item.description: The ColorMag theme for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized access due to a missing capability check on the plugin_action_callback() function in all versions up to, and including, 3.1.2. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with subscriber-level access and above, to install and activate arbitrary plugins.

item.title: CVE-2024-1370|2024-08-01T18:40:19.865Z -- themegrill -- maintenance%20page
item.description: The Maintenance Page plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized access of data due to a missing capability check on the subscribe_download function hooked via AJAX action in all versions up to, and including, 1.0.8. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with subscriber access or higher, to download a csv containing subscriber emails.

item.title: CVE-2024-1462|2024-08-01T18:40:21.196Z -- themegrill -- maintenance%20page
item.description: The Maintenance Page plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Basic Information Exposure in all versions up to, and including, 1.0.8 via the REST API. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to view post titles and content when the site is in maintenance mode.

item.title: CVE-2024-37432|2024-07-22T13:34:07.986Z -- themegrill -- esteem
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in ThemeGrill Esteem allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Esteem: from n/a through 1.5.0.

item.title: CVE-2024-1370|2024-06-04T18:01:20.107Z -- themegrill -- maintenance%20page
item.description: The Maintenance Page plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized access of data due to a missing capability check on the subscribe_download function hooked via AJAX action in all versions up to, and including, 1.0.8. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with subscriber access or higher, to download a csv containing subscriber emails.

item.title: CVE-2024-1462|2024-03-13T15:26:53.894Z -- themegrill -- maintenance%20page
item.description: The Maintenance Page plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Basic Information Exposure in all versions up to, and including, 1.0.8 via the REST API. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to view post titles and content when the site is in maintenance mode.

item.title: CVE-2024-33540|2024-06-04T17:45:18.892Z -- themegrill -- colornews
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in ThemeGrill ColorNews allows Stored XSS.This issue affects ColorNews: from n/a through 1.2.6.

item.title: CVE-2024-34571|2024-06-04T17:41:16.467Z -- themegrill -- himalayas
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in ThemeGrill Himalayas allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Himalayas: from n/a through 1.3.0.

item.title: CVE-2024-2500|2024-06-04T17:30:11.203Z -- themegrill -- colormag
item.description: The ColorMag theme for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via a user's Display Name in all versions up to, and including, 3.1.6 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authentciated attackers, with contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2024-37432|2024-07-22T08:25:25.418Z -- themegrill -- esteem
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in ThemeGrill Esteem allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Esteem: from n/a through 1.5.0.

item.title: CVE-2024-1462|2024-07-31T19:51:56.025Z -- themegrill -- maintenance%20page
item.description: The Maintenance Page plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Basic Information Exposure in all versions up to, and including, 1.0.8 via the REST API. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to view post titles and content when the site is in maintenance mode.
